showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . It is easy to get in and out of the fueling islands and they is plenty of parking. I've never used the shower facilities so I cannot speak to that but given the standards at the rest of the truck stop I would expect them to be quite good.

Sunshine is anything but. Filled a semi truck for hundreds of dollars and hassled for my free shower. B attitude bc she had to handle it. No respect for her elders. What we call w trash. Obviously bringing baggage to work. She would be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ be replaced!  My husband is a truck driver.  He stopped at this specific pilot (#448) and the showers were shut down! He spoke to someone who said they did not want to clean the showers that‚Äôs why they were shut down. That‚Äôs just ridiculous ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ DO NOT COME HERE. GO ACROSS THE STREET TO THE OTHER PILOT/FLYING J. 6PM AND THEIR SHOWERS DO NOT HAVE HOT WATER! ‚Ä¶
Always a problem with showers !!! ‚Ä¶

I use to come to this truck stop all the time but they pushed me away with their prices.  I had to shower here and unfortunately I was out of showers so had to pay it out of my pocket. It was $25. Yes,  I didn't mistype.  $25 for a well ‚Ä¶
They need to fix and maintain the shower heads. Had 2 showers in different rooms shower heads were leaking water behind the wall.they have nice rooms but. Need to keep them up.

Pilot travel center is always the best! They have almost everything you need to be on the road here. The gas is also cheap compared to others along the freeway. I believe that they have shower in the restroom.
Plenty of parking and Wendy‚Äôs was fine but thanks Pilot for another cold shower on the road
Just talked with Rob store manager not enough towels. Shower had luke warm water and minimal pressure. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: After spending all day in Chicago traffic and  totally exhausted, I came here at 7 p.m. at  night surprisingly there was free parking spaces and I got an instant shower. I will definitely come back here to this oasis!
Large spacious parking, but 50% blind side. Shower is okay, water is softish. No beer indeed. Potholes...

No wonder it wasn't a wait for the showers.... 25.00 for a shower!!!! 25.00 for a shower???? 25.00 for a shower!!!!!!! Probably 25.00 to reserve a parking spot too huh???? These ba y wipes was 4.00 ...and im a keep using mudflap...

Just stopped to get a shower $25 should have got a shower and walked out with the towels this is a rip off have to pay to park and pay to get a shower t a is $17 and some of the pilots and flying j is $18 but I got told it is because the ‚Ä¶
I don't understand why this place has so many bad reviews. I went in there looking for something wrong. The shower was nice.

Shower was clean. Staff as nice,  but the water is absolutely terrible. It's like Showering with soap from beginning to end.
The shower is cold and you might catch a cold. I recommend this shower only for truck drivers who are confident in their physical strength.

‚Ä¶ a class to all the other stores on customer satisfaction.   I've been driving for 8 years, I walked in to get a shower and the first thing I heard was our system is down.  Instantly upset, until the friendly person working informed me to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ parking lot to at least fit 200 trucks and it never fills up at night. Friendly staff, and hot food. However, when my fiance and i were taking a shower, it was the coldest shower we've had in awhile. Mainly with it being so cold outside....

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Tons of truck parking, found parking in the afternoon no problem. Showers nice and clean. Was not greeted upon entry. The store was in good order. All the pumps seem to have worked. Not a bad location for a 34 as a trucker. They have laundry machines and dryers as well. All seem to be in working order which is a plus.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

This love‚Äôs location right off Interstate 65 exit 230 is very nice and convenient. The restrooms and showers were very clean and well maintained. Plenty of truck parking available during the day and there is a Arby‚Äôs restaurant inside.

Very clean all the staff was extremely helpful and very nice The food and the attached Arby's was really good and fresh I traveled from Illinois and stopped here on the way to my destination and I will stop here again to have a lot of ‚Ä¶

I rarely leave reviews for the truck stops i stop at, but this loves really went above and beyond. On the shower door there was a little post it note saying have a good day. Something so simple but honest really made me smile. ‚Ä¶

Thank you! I recently took a bus trip, and our driver made a stop here. The restrooms were the cleanest, nicest and best-stocked of any stop I made on this trip. A staff member was also gracious enough to open an extra bathroom because ‚Ä¶
The clerk greeted us as soon as we walked in to go potty. That was a pleasant surprise! The bathrooms were fairly clean, and I liked the added exfoliating soap in women's bathroom. ‚Ä¶

The waiting time for the shower is an issue but everyone in the front end was trying to fix it they were nice people, still one of the cleanest TA I‚Äôve been
‚Ä¶ Unless you have TA loyalty points and you can grab a free shower, I would go across the street to Loves. I hear the Arby's is open, kind of like the sign suggests.

Dirty shower. Also don‚Äôt fall for the bait and switch at the restaurant, I was told the Friday special was $7.99 but got a bill of almost $19 and was told price has changed recently. Don‚Äôt Eat Here or Take a SHOWER.

‚Ä¶ see her again so we couldn't get a  to go box. Then had to wait for almost an hour for a shower because the monitor was down and no one wanted to inform the drivers the system is down. When we did get into a shower it was extremely small. ‚Ä¶
Wow tremendous I had the greatest shower oh so soft that water I love it it makes your skin soft as well as your hair .... ‚Ä¶

so just got there filled my truck up, so me and my team
decided on taking a shower, worst shower ever had. if yall

it's like never been maintained before.

‚Ä¶ I do all the time to fuel and to eat.. The showers are always clean BUT they have very hard water( makes me feel like I never get clean) So I only take a shower here in Pure  Desperation.. They need to put in a water softer or alot better ‚Ä¶

Great place to eat and shower, clean bathrooms. The shop needs to work on their customer service though, been in twice for a oil change, both times it took 2 hours to do the job once my truck got in the shop.

‚Ä¶ non English speaking goat herders could get there slurppies got fuel ate and slept a few hrs.got up to go get a hot shower and was told my fuel receipt was expired seems its only good for two hrs wont be back and none of our drivers ‚Ä¶

I loved it. They were Great. showers were great. filled up my truck. Received complimentary free shower. Lots and lots of varieties here. Place to relax in the sofas. Look around. 2 different restaurants. shopping. Play room,bar,The gas ‚Ä¶

Spotlessly clean place, nice environment for work, enjoyable place for truckers, plenty of truck parking space, lots of food from inside the store as well as the Restaurant with live music, and DD coffee and goods on the inside. ‚Ä¶

All signs should point to Compass! Best shower I‚Äôve EVER had on the road. The staff are ON üî• w/ cleaning across the travel center. Great place to do a 34 or even a quick stop. They have 8 showers (cost $15 unless you have a voucher - but ‚Ä¶

I65 x 230 ..6.15.25... It's a very new facility, very, very clean. The food is really good. The people are nice. I highly recommend this. Stop the only thing I don't like is that they serve alcohol. There's no reason any place should be ‚Ä¶

Very clean place, had breakfast (nothing spectacular) food was ‚Äúok‚Äù service was good, did my laundry washer/dryers work well and are clean. Took a shower and shower was clean and water stayed hot. Also fueled-touch screen pumps which was ‚Ä¶

Glad I stopped grt place. Not too crowded. Large food selections, gaming area, massage chairs. Toys, truck accessories. A mini truck parts store. There even a bar n grill inside.  Showers and laundry area.

Stopped here because I needed gas. Was disappointed with the price of gas. It was $3.99 while all throughout my road trip through Wisconsin and Minnesota the price was cheaper. Got enough to get me back to Marion where gas was $3.57. The restroom was nice and clean though. And the cashier greeted me when I walked through the door.

This is a decent pilot to stop at!! Staff is always friendly and the store is always clean!!! This is a small pilot but it gets the job done!! There is parking for about 20 trucks and 4 fuel lanes!! This pilot also has a CAT scale. Its got ‚Ä¶
It was very clean, seamed to have about everything you could, need while on the go. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The prices were decent for a travel center. It's worth stopping by.

‚Ä¶ Last year with my son we used the shower and we changed his shoes and forgot the other pair.. called later evening and said never seen it.. ‚Ä¶
Shower was clean but the restroom is dirty with toilet paper on the floor in multiple stalls. It looked neglected

‚Ä¶ hour wait time. Now I know why they did, because everyone avoids this Love's. I didn't even get a free shower for the loss of my time and I was late on my load. And, I almost forgot, they didn't even know you needed to match tread depth on ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ full of good attitude I hope every truck Stop is the same as this one.  Bathroom and shower is clean..  the parking lot is huge and lots of parking. Just get here before midnight and you‚Äôll mostly likely find a spot to park.  My experience ‚Ä¶
One of the dirtiest Love‚Äôs I been into. Bathroom floor was covered in hair and dirt. There were shower towels on the floor of the shopping area.
Quite spacious parking and clean, clean showers and store employees at the store very friendly. ‚Ä¶

Poor Customer Service And The Trucker Shower Room Floor In Shower #2 Was Filthy They Didn't Even Think About Sweeping And I Had Ants Crawling Around On My Shower Room Floor & The Laundry Room Floor Was Filthy Too. ‚Ä¶
Was 2nd on line for a shower, middle of the day, the personnel just played around doing their own business , been waiting more than 1 hour to get a shower
The showers are very disappointing.  Mold on the shower head, walls, and soap containers. Very old towels that still smelled like the previous person. TRUCKERS I don't suggest these showers.
